posts.post_content:
I'm looking to buy the following Obak cards, either T212-2 or T212-3, in about good condition, raw or graded (psa 1 -3):
Armbuster, Christian, Criger, Cutshaw, Delhi, Fitzgerald, Garrett, Gordon, Harris, Hiester, Howard, LaLonge, Mahoney, McCredie, Melchior, Mensor, Mitze, Rodgers, Shinn, Spencer, Vitt, Warren, Wiggs.
